is a high quality Magento Theme with custom admin module, well suited for every type of store. Compatible with Magento: 1.6.x.x (1.6.0.0, 1.6.1.0, 1.6.2.0), 1.7.x.x (1.7.0.0, 1.7.0.1, 1.7.0.2)

Features

[ox_list type="ox_list_simple"]
  • One Click Install
  • Unlimited colors
  • Two Styles: Light & Dark
  • Flexible frontpage
  • Custom admin module
  • Full width and Boxed layout styles

item.title: TEASER SHORTCODE
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
How to add teaser boxes to page

To add teaser box to your page simply click on teaser box shortcode button, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode. Use columns to set different amount of teasers per row.

How it looks

[one_third][teaser url="#" title="Create your online Store!" src="http://localhost/work/retro.wp/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/teasers.jpg" excerpt="Start sell online today with our Simplicity theme! It comes with WooCommerce, eCommerce and Jigoshop WordPress plugins support." ]Shop now![/teaser][/one_third] [one_third][teaser url="#" title="Responsive Design" src="http://localhost/work/retro.wp/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/teasers.jpg" excerpt="This theme looks great not only on desktops but also on devices. What means that there are no special requirements to browse your website." ]See How it Works[/teaser][/one_third] [one_third last=last] [teaser url="#" title="One Click Install" src="http://localhost/work/retro.wp/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/teasers.jpg" excerpt="You will love this theme from the first steps! You can setup this theme with the same look as on preview in just a couple of clicks." ]Learn more[/teaser][/one_third] [clear]

item.title: SHARE BUTTONS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
HOW TO ADD SOCIAL SHARE BUTTONS TO YOUR PAGE/POST.

To add social buttons simply click on the social shortcode button (star icon), that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode.
[one_half]

Facebook


[social_button button="facebook" furl="http://www.facebook.com/olegnax" fsend="on" flayout="box_count" fshow_faces="on" fwidth="250" faction="like" fcolorsheme="light"] [social_button button="facebook" furl="http://www.facebook.com/olegnax" flayout="standard" fwidth="300" faction="recommend" fcolorsheme="light"] [social_button button="facebook" furl="http://www.facebook.com/olegnax" flayout="button_count" fwidth="300" faction="like" fcolorsheme="dark"] [social_button button="facebook" flayout="standard" fshow_faces="on" fwidth="300" faction="like" fcolorsheme="light"] [/one_half] [one_half last=last] [/one_half] [clear]
[one_half]

Google +


[social_button button="google" gsize="small" gannatation="inline" gurl="#"]
[social_button button="google" gsize="standard" gannatation="bubble" ghtml5="on" gurl="#"]
[social_button button="google" gsize="medium" gannatation="none" gurl="#"]
[social_button button="google" gsize="tall" gannatation="bubble" ghtml5="on" gurl="#"]
[social_button button="google" gsize="small" gannatation="bubble" ghtml5="on" gurl="#"] [/one_half] [one_half last=last] [/one_half] [clear]
[one_half]

Twitter


[social_button button="twitter" turl="https://twitter.com/olegnax" ttext ="Some custom text" tcount ="horizontal" tsize ="large" tvia ="olegnax" trelated ="/olegnax"]
[social_button button="twitter" turl="https://twitter.com/olegnax" tcount ="none" tvia ="olegnax"]
[social_button button="twitter" turl="https://twitter.com/olegnax" tcount ="vertical"]
[social_button button="twitter" turl="https://twitter.com/olegnax" tcount ="horizontal"]
[/one_half] [one_half last=last] [/one_half] [clear]
[one_half]

Pinterest


[social_button button="pinterest" purl="" pmedia="" pcount="horizontal" ptext="Some custom text"] [/one_half] [one_half last=last] [/one_half]

item.title: BLOG SHORTCODE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
How to add simple blog listing to page

To add blog shortcode to your page simply click on blog shortcode button, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode.

Sample Code

[blog category="2,3,4,1" perpage="2" pagination="on" ]
[clear]

EXAMPLE

Check this page: Blog Shortcode

[blog category="2,3,4,1" perpage="2" pagination="on" ]

item.title: CONTACT FORM BUILDER
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
You can create any form you need with our contact form shortcode builder!

To add contact form to your page simply click on contact form shortcode button, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode. After you click popup with builder will apper where you can add/remove different fields and set your email.

CONTACT FORM EXAMPLE - 1

[ox-contact-form] [contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form][clear]

Sample Code

[ox-contact-form] [contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form][clear]


CONTACT FORM EXAMPLE - 2

[ox-contact-form] [contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [contact-field label="I want to recieve newsletters" type="checkbox" /] [contact-field label="Choose your country" type="select" options="USA,Canada,France,Germany,Other" /] [contact-field label="Yes or not?" type="radio" options="Yes,No" /] [contact-field label="Just Another text field" type="text" /] [contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form]

Sample Code

[ox-contact-form] [contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [contact-field label="I want to recieve newsletters" type="checkbox" /] [contact-field label="Choose your country" type="select" options="USA,Canada,France,Germany,Other" /] [contact-field label="Yes or not?" type="radio" options="Yes,No" /] [contact-field label="Just Another text field" type="text" /] [contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form]


CONTACT FORM WITH RECAPTCHA - 2

[ox-contact-form captcha="1"] [ox-contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [ox-contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" reply="true" /] [ox-contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [ox-contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form]

Sample Code

[ox-contact-form captcha="1"] [ox-contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [ox-contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" reply="true" /] [ox-contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [ox-contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form]

item.title: BUTTON SHORTCODES
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
How to add button to page/post

To add button to your page/post simply click on "buttons" shortcode button, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode.

Styles & Colors

This theme comes with different button styles and you can set any color for any button.

Examples

  [button type="btn_small" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#723f32" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_small" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#d0b183" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_small" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#939b38" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_small" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#288bac" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_small" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#ac288d" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_small" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#992a22" ]button[/button] [clear]  [button type="btn_border" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#723f32" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_border" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#d0b183" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_border" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#939b38" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_border" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#288bac" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_border" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#ac288d" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_border" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#992a22" ]button[/button] [clear]  [button type="btn_text" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#723f32" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_text" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#d0b183" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_text" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#939b38" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_text" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#288bac" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_text" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#ac288d" ]button[/button] [button type="btn_text" url="#" target="" button_color_fon="#992a22" ]button[/button]

item.title: COLUMN SHORTCODES
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Short about column shortcodes

Column shortcodes can be found in Visual and HTML mode of editor. There are lots of column shortcodes available. Remember to use the "last" shortcode for the last column in the row. And add clear shortcode after each column group.  
 

Full width

item.title: AUDIO SHORTCODE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:

To add audio player to your page: 1. Click on "Upload/Insert" icon just abow the editor. Add media popup will appear. 2. Upload your audio and click "Insert into post"

To add testimonials to your page simply click on testimonials shortcode button, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode.

item.title: PORTFOLIO SHORTCODES
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
HOW TO ADD PORTFOLIO LISTING TO PAGE

To add portfolio listing to your page simply click on portfolio shortcode button, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode.

VARIETY OF LAYOUTS

You can choose on of three different layouts and choose wheiter it will be with pagination or isotope. Also there are carousel shortcode for portfolio.

"BIG" LAYOUT


[terms_portfolio terms="13" perpage="1" pagination="" layout="" isotope=""][clear]

"MEDIUM" LAYOUT


[terms_portfolio terms="16" perpage="2" pagination="" layout="medium" isotope=""][clear]

"SMALL" LAYOUT


[terms_portfolio terms="16" perpage="4" pagination="" layout="small" isotope=""][clear]

"CAROUSEL"


[portfolio_carousel title="From Portfolio" terms="16" ][clear]

item.title: ONE CLICK TO INSTALL
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
[one_half] [/one_half] [one_half last=last]

IT IS EXTREMELY EASY
TO INSTALL

You will love this theme from the first steps! With our “One click install” feature you can setup the theme with almost the same look and feel as it is on the preview in just a few clicks. * Images from preview are not included [/one_half] [clear]

[one_half]

ALL YOU NEED TO DO IS

1. To install and activate our theme: Dashboard -> Appearance -> Themes -> Install Themes -> Upload. 2. To go to Dashboard -> Theme Options -> Dummy Content and click on the "Install dummy content" button. That’s It! [/one_half] [one_half last=last][/one_half]

item.title: UNLIMITED COLORS
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
Control every pixel of a theme from the Admin Panel directly!

You have full control over theme colors.

Feeling not that confident with CSS? With Retro theme you can manage site color scheme right from the Admin Panel. Extensive editing options that come with the theme will help you adjust every piece of your site fast & easy.

Every Shortcode comes with its editing options that are intuitively clear and simple to set up.

item.title: CUSTOM WIDGETS
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
WE'VE GOT EVERYTHING YOU MAY NEED!

We tried to include all of the important widgets you may need for your site.
This theme is provided with the following custom widgets: contact form, Flickr, From portfolio, Revolution Slider, Twitter, FeedBurner, MailChimp, Recent posts, Popular posts and Testimonials.




All of the widgets come with extended editing options for more precise set up.

item.title: TRANSLATION READY
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
YOU CAN EASILY TRANSLATE IT TO ANY LANGUAGE

Our theme is translation-ready. You can translate it to any language as well as set it up for multiple languages. It includes a .POT file that is used to create .po/.mo files in the language you need.

MAKE IT MULTILINGUAL WITH WPML

WPML makes it easy to run a multilingual website with a single WordPress install. Choose languages you'd like to use for your site and start translating content. You can arrange different language contents in the same domain (in language directories), in sub-domains or in completely different domains. [button type="btn_border" url="http://wpml.org/" target="" button_color_fon="#723f32" ]Learn more about WPML[/button]

item.title: CUSTOM CSS STYLES
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
YOU CAN ADD CUSTOM CSS RULES
FROM ADMIN PANEL

It allows you to change theme look without editing core theme files. Custom CSS rules let you change theme look and skip core theme files editing. All of the applied CSS rules are stored in a database & saved after theme updates.

item.title: CUSTOM POST TYPES
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
Besides a standard post type, out theme comes with 2 custom solutions for portfolio and testimonials management.

These post types have been specially developed to present your site images and clients feedback in the best way. More info about post types can be found at official Wordpress website https://codex.wordpress.org/Post_Types

item.title: POWERFUL ADMIN PANEL
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
TONS OF OPTIONS

to help you create an awesome site!

Need a website fast? It has never been easier to get one!

Our Control Panel is so intuitive and detailed that even an average computer user can comfortably take charge of site creation process.

All of the settings come with hint messages and are logically arranged in groups. So you always know what you have changed & where to find a needed option. We hope such an approach will turn your site creation process into a pleasant experience.

and lots more inside…

item.title: CONTACT FORM BUILDER
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
You can easily create any form you need! with our contact form shortcode builder!

You do not need to install any third-party plugins to create a form - we've added a contact form builder right to the default Wordpress content editor both for posts & pages. To add a contact form to a page just click on its shortcode button in the Visual mode and start customizing.

CONTACT FORM EXAMPLE - 1

[ox-contact-form] [contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form][clear]

Sample Code

[ox-contact-form] [contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form][clear]


CONTACT FORM EXAMPLE - 2

[ox-contact-form] [contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [contact-field label="I want to recieve newsletters" type="checkbox" /] [contact-field label="Choose your country" type="select" options="USA,Canada,France,Germany,Other" /] [contact-field label="Yes or not?" type="radio" options="Yes,No" /] [contact-field label="Just Another text field" type="text" /] [contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form]

Sample Code

[ox-contact-form] [contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" /] [contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [contact-field label="I want to recieve newsletters" type="checkbox" /] [contact-field label="Choose your country" type="select" options="USA,Canada,France,Germany,Other" /] [contact-field label="Yes or not?" type="radio" options="Yes,No" /] [contact-field label="Just Another text field" type="text" /] [contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form]


CONTACT FORM WITH RECAPTCHA - 2

[ox-contact-form captcha="1"] [ox-contact-field label="Name" type="name" required="true" /] [ox-contact-field label="Email" type="email" required="true" reply="true" /] [ox-contact-field label="Website" type="url" /] [ox-contact-field label="Comment" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/ox-contact-form]

Sample Code

item.title: STOP SPAM. READ BOOKS.
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
RECAPTCHA

Our theme comes with the integrated reCaptcha widget for contact form shortcode that helps you protect your email from annoying spam bots. Its setup takes just few minutes but will definitely save you lots of time afterwards. If you decide to turn reCaptcha off, that can be also easily done from the Contact Form settings.

EXAMPLE

Check how contact form with recaptha looks here.

ABOUT RECAPTCHA

A CAPTCHA is a program that can tell whether its user is a human or a computer. You’ve probably seen them — colorful images with distorted text at the bottom of Web registration forms. CAPTCHAs are used by many websites to prevent abuse from “bots,” or automated programs usually written to generate spam. No computer program can read distorted text as well as humans can, so bots cannot navigate sites protected by CAPTCHAs. [button type="btn_border" url="http://www.google.com/recaptcha/learnmore" target="" button_color_fon="#723f32" ]More info here[/button][clear]

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I'm not a huge fan of Muse, nor do I really like dubstep, but I think Muse is the most talented band that would be able to release good tracks with dubstep influence. I trust that Muse﻿ will keep making good music and that 'The 2nd Law' will bring forth as such.
I highly recommend listening to this on a properly loud sound system with at least a couple of sub woofers....it will﻿ give a tiny tiny glimpse of how awesome this will be live
They﻿ wont disappoint. I promise.

item.title: SOCIAL ICONS
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
HOW TO ADD SOCIAL ICONS TO YOUR PAGE/POST.

To add social icons simply click on the social shortcode button (bird icon), that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode.

DEFAULT STYLE

item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
HOW TO ADD PORTFOLIO CAROUSEL TO PAGE

To add portfolio carousel to your page simply click on portfolio carousel button, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode.

[portfolio_carousel title="CAROUSEL EXAMPLE" terms="16" ][clear]

item.title: ANNOUNCE BLOCK
item.dc:creator: retrowp
item.content:encoded:
HOW TO ADD ANNOUNCE BLOCK TO PAGE

To add announce block to your page simply click on shortcode button called slogan, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode.

EXAMPLES


[slogan h1="WE ARE A GROUP OF EXPERIENCED DEVELOPERS." h3="WE SET NEW STANDARDS IN USER EXPERIENCE & MAKE FUTURE HAPPEN."][/slogan]
[slogan h1="ONLY TITLE" ][/slogan]
[slogan h1="WITH DESCRIPTION" ]Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo[/slogan]
